name: Too many planes - Free
description:
You need to make quick decisions in this point and click game. Eight planes are moving towards each other. Can you steer them away before it all ends in a crash. Dexterity and presision is what you need to win this game. Do you overconfident? Try and run the courses at night and become humble again.

Free version, NO pay to win. All features for free, NO accidental "in-app purchases".

How to play:
The plane must go outside the screen.
Steer the plane to the right edge with the right color.
Point your finger on a plane and draw a way out to an edge.
